welcome_message_body: Welcome to Heroica Guaymas, Mexico! Get ready to be charmed by the city's rich history, beautiful beaches, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this enchanting destination has to offer.

restaurants.name: Tacos Luis "El Ñar"
restaurants.description: Tacos Luis "El Ñar" is a taco restaurant located in Guaymas.

restaurants.name: Tacos Mortales
restaurants.description: Tacos Mortales is a taco restaurant located in Guaymas.

restaurants.name: Astros Pastelería y Cafeteria
restaurants.description: Astros Pastelería y Cafeteria is a breakfast spot located in Guaymas.

restaurants.name: Tortas Lucerito
restaurants.description: Tortas Lucerito is a mexican restaurant located in Guaymas.

restaurants.name: Las Cachoreadas
restaurants.description: Las Cachoreadas is a seafood restaurant located in Guaymas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gen Jose M Yanez Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gen Jose M Yanez Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
